name: Open Mic Night
description:
The spirit has come back. He's haunting the best bar in town, and it's time for him to leave.

Use your accordion to challenge him to a duel. Mimic his melodies to stay alive. Harmonize with his guitar to send him into the depths.

Use A, S, D, F to play notes assigned to you as they cross the bar. Harmonize through the all 3 choruses to win. Make more than 5 mistakes and you're toast. Good luck.

–––––––––––

Made for the Portland Indie Game Squad's Summer Slow Jam 2020.

The prompt and theme were 'music-first' and 'ghost notes' with a two-week jam timeline.

A huge thank you to BennyKok for his Rhythm Game Starter kit from the Unity Asset Store, which took care of 90% of the really tough work. You're an angel.

I'll probably put the song up free on Bandcamp in a bit; I'll update here with the link when I do.

I'm seeing a bit of audio sluggishness on my very old PC; let me know if you see the same thing. I'm trying to sort out if it's the build or my horrible PC.

This was my first solo jam, here's what I came up with. Thanks so much for giving it a go.
